name: One Night at Fidget Spinner
description:
Version 1.0.0

Click the flag to go back to the title screen whenever you win or lose. Gameplay is simple, since only the mouse is necessary.

Press the red button besides the doors to close them, and click them when they're green to open the doors.

Hover your mouse over the bottom of the screen to pull up your cameras or to pull them down.

Select cameras with your mouse by clicking the little buttons on the map.

Survive until 6 a.m. (in game time).

Don't run out of power, otherwise you won't be able to close the doors.

If you unlock cheats, you'll get the option to control several aspects of the game with the WASD keys, the controls are the following:

S= Press S to open the cameras.

W= Pressing W skips to the next camera.

A= Pressing A closes the left door.

D= Pressing D closes the right door.

Note that you need to unlock cheats to activate these shortcuts, and you need to unlock this cheat option.

There is content you can unlock beyond the one night, so you can do more after beating the night, it'll be saved on your local browser data.

Even if this game is called One Night there's like 5 lol, but there's one main one.

This game is a fanmade game based on the Five Nights at Freddy's series, made by Scott Cawthon, made only as a passionate project for the game franchise itself.

This game was made on Scratch 3.25.0
